error.message: Call to deprecated function module_load_include(). Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:11.0.0. Use Drupal::moduleHandler()->loadInclude($module, $type, $name = NULL). Note that including code from uninstalled extensions is no longer supported.

Call to deprecated function drupal_get_installed_schema_version(). Deprecated in drupal:9.3.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Update\UpdateHookRegistry::getInstalledVersion() or \Drupal\Core\Update\UpdateHookRegistry::getAllInstalledVersions() instead.

Call to deprecated method drupalPostForm() of class Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:9.1.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use $this->submitForm() instead.
Call to deprecated method drupalPostForm() of class Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:9.1.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use $this->submitForm() instead.

Call to deprecated method assertNoUniqueText() of class Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.2.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Instead, use $this->getSession()->pageTextMatchesCount() if you know the cardinality in advance, or $this->getSession()->getPage()->getText() and substr_count().
